thread.title: Woman dies post childbirth; couple running clinic arrested
thread.title_full: Woman dies post childbirth; couple running clinic arrested

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Woman dies post childbirth; couple running clinic arrested
text:
Tribune News Service
Chandigarh, October 2
A couple who were running a medical clinic in Colony No. 4, Industrial Area, was arrested after a 25-year-old woman died post childbirth here last night. She was allegedly administered an injection by the couple during the delivery. The duo was later released on bail. The police are verifying whether they are registered medical practitioners or not. A case was registered under Section 304-A (causing death by negligence) of the IPC at the Industrial Area police station. The police said the deceased woman was identified as Radhna, who was staying with her husband, Ashok, here, at Colony No.4. Ashok is a daily wage earner and is a native of Uttar Pradesh. Sources said the woman died after an injection was administered to her by the couple. Ashok, alleged that his wife complained of stomach pain after which he took her to a nearby clinic run by Javed Akhtar and his wife, where she delivered a baby. “During the delivery, my wife was administered injection by the couple, but post childbirth her condition deteriorated when we were returning home”, he said. The woman was rushed to the GMCH-32 where doctors declared her brought dead. The body has been kept at the mortuary for a post-mortem examination.
